lines.text: [Watching Charles and Henry stealing Bernie]
What kind of idiots would steal a dead body?
We did!
Swim with the fishes, you zombie bastard!

[Charles and Henry have been turned into goats and are being led on rope leashes by the dead zombie, Bernie]
Ain't this a bitch?
Where's he taking us?
I don't know. Well, at least we get to see the carnival.
Yeah, but I didn't think we was gonna *be*, the carnival.
Hey Henry check out that fine mamma she is fine.
Oh yeah. Charles you're starting to frighten me.
Why would you need to guard a dead man stuck in a two foot refrigerator?
Stealing shoes off a dead man. Oh, we're going to hell.
I was not the one who was out CONGA-DANCING all night, huh!

[in the morgue, panicked]
Lar. Lar. Lar. Lar. La... L...
What?
I'm gonna have a heartattack now, I think I'm gonna sit down thanks...
[Charles is searching the porn theater for the escaped chicken, and comes across a movie patron with a chicken in his lap and tries to take it]
What are you doing?
Oh, I lost the chicken.
No, no, no. This chicken's with me.

[after finding Bernie with a girl on the beach]
I see... And where did you and Bernie meet?
In the conga-line.
In the conga-line?
He's an excellent dancer.

[Larry pulls Richard from the sea water and helps lay him on the sand]
. Richie breathe.
[Richard awakens and spits water in Larry's face]
Richie you spit on me!

[dazed]
I feel so much better.

[examining the unconscious Mobu after being struck by the flailing limbs of Bernie]
She suffered a concussion. She'll be out for hours.
Oh. I'm dead. The sun is setting. Just let me lay down and throw some dirt on me.
Wait! She can't be out! We brought the money to her! She's gotta help Richie and remove the curse!
She can't do anything like this.

Oh. Claudia! Weren't you telling me that there was a way to reverse a curse put on one person by switching the curse to a different person so that the curse was not on the one person but back on the original person?
It's possible, but you have to believe in the magic for it to work.
In a hypethetical sense, right?
Stop joking!

[motions to Richard slumped against the house]
Look at him! He's dying over here, already! I believe!
I believe. I believe.
Poppa, you can do that kind of magic. I've seen you do it before.
It's possible. But, I need the blood of a virgin.
Um...
Oh. Goodbye.

[Larry puts his hand to his chin, walks around behind Claudia's dad, and with his back to him in embaressment, holds out his finger. Claudia's dad looks at Larry's finger, then up to Larry]
You?

[Not making eye contact with the Doctor]
Just take the blood, Doc.
[the doctor pricks Larry's finger, Larry faints]

[both have just seen Bernie fall back flat, dead after turning the music off]
Ain't this a bitch!
Dead!
As a doornail!
Come on, let's get him!
what kind of name is Mobu anyways, sounds like some kind of car wax, Mobu.

[Inside the Bank of St. Thomas]
Sign the card please, Mr. Lomax.

[hums]
Hmm.
What was that?

[Larry moves Bernie's head as if Bernie was whispering to Richard; hums again]
Hmm.
Oh, yeah. Go right ahead, sure.
[Larry forges Bernie's signature on the card. The bank exec checks the card out]
And now the key, please?
You have the key, don't ya?
[Larry pulls Bernie's deposit box key out of the trench-coat and hands it to the exec]
Thank you. I'll just go through the vault and get your safety deposit box.
[the exec leaves to head into the vault]
It's working
Like falling off a log,
[Outside at the submarine port, many of the tourists are outraged at Hummel's craziness during the tour. Hummel is restrained by the Atlantis security team handed to the St. Thomas Police]
I don't know, He went crazy down there! He kept trying to open the hatch!

[yells]
I'm not crazy! Lomax is down there! I can -
[Claudia's father, a doctor, gives Hummel a sedative to calm him down]
Whoa, Doc.
[smirks and smiles]
Good stuff.
That oughta hold him for awhile.
What happened to him?
Maybe he suffers from claustrophobia.
Yeah?
The group might've set him off.
That's it. I'm gonna deport this guy.
Are ya?

[to Hummel]
Yeah.
[then to the doctor]
Say Doc, maybe you better come along with us. This guy's nuts!
You got that right.
[Both the cop and the doctor get in the squad car]

[under the sedation]
Yeah Doc, come on in here. Got your bag?
Yes, I got the bag.
[Henry & Charles finds Larry & Richard asleep in the hotel lobby. They wake Larry & Richard up with a punch]

[both are awaken; shocked]
What, what? I don't have any money, man! I don't...
All right, all right. Now y'all just be cool, man. Just be cool.
[Larry chuckles nervously]

[to Richard]
How are you doing?
Fine, thank you. How are you?
Shh.
Where the dead man at?
Oh, he's in the Jeep. You can have him.
No, no, no, my brotha. He is NOT in the Jeep! Where is he?
Well, what do you mean?
He's in the Jeep.
Did you try that red Jeep?

[to Richard]
Uh-uh.
You're kidding?
[to Larry]
He's not there.
Yo, man, what are we gonna do with there two?
I know what. We're gonna take them to the Mobu and let them explain to HER, that way SHE gonna understand that WE gonna be cool and they gonna be exactly where we is!

[confused]
Huh?
Oh, yeah. Then we can blame them.
We're gonna try.
Say how would you fellas like a margarita?

[laughs]
On me!
[At the Mobu's compound]

[scolds Henry and Charles]
You've lost them.
Well, not-not exactly. Um...
Anybody could have.
Twice. He was going to lead you to the money.
Oh, yes, but Bu, I know. We messed with the bones and that fool with the conjure, and now he can only walk when the music playing. We're sorry.
Where is he now?

[points to Richard and Larry]
The white boys.
Um...
He - We don't know where he is.
We left him in the Jeep, dead.
Deceased.
Yeah, but ask them what they was doing at the bank with Bernie?
Well... Rich - No. Well, we needed him to get into the safety deposit box
What was in the box?
A map.

[the cartel mobsters come towards Richard and Larry]
Give me the map.
We don't have it.
We don't have the map.
No map.

[to his partner]
Kill them.
[Richard and Larry protests, yelling about whose fault it is]

[to the mobsters]
If we kill them, we both lose. I have another way.
[the Mobu takes a cup and scoops out a concoction. Then walks to Richard]
Drink.

[hesitant]
I'd love to. You see, I just had lunch...
[Cartel Man #1 hold Richard at gunpoint]
... but there's always room for Jell-O.
[Richard drinks the poisonous concoction, then hands the cup back to Mobu]
A powerful conjure. Unless you have the antidote by night, you die. Bring me the map, you live.
[Larry gasps as he hugs a helpless Richard]
